MechWarrior 3: Pirate\&#039;s Moon

MechWarrior 3: Pirate\&#039;s Moon is the expansion pack for MechWarrior 3, with an all new storyline and 20 new missions, plus six new \&#039;Mech and a number of weapons. The player has the choice to play as either a pirate (attacker) or a Mercenary (defender) for the Eridani Light Horse.

[edit] Additional Mechs Featured in this Game

    * Atlas
    * Awesome
    * Centurion
    * Clint IIC
    * Warhawk
    * Stormcrow
    * Clan Elemental Battle Armor (The player could now obtain and pilot the Elemental.)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mechwarrior has several compatibility issues with Windows XP, leading the game to freeze or crash. These issues can be addressed by changing the compatibility setting for the game.

Most of the time changing it to run as windows98 will works, some choose windows2000.
Just make sure all the .exe files are the same.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remember youll need Mechwarrior3 to play this expansion.
